sense.gloss: sturgeon (esp. the green sturgeon, Acipenser medirostris)
rough skin (like that of a shark)
saw shark (esp. the Japanese saw shark, Prietiophorus japonicus)
shagreen (from a shark or stingray), sharkskin, shark leather
remora, suckerfish, sharksucker (any fish of family Echeneidae)
blue shark (Prionace glauca, species of circumglobal requiem shark)

sdata.j: ↑鮫↑↓さめ↓はその↑血↑↓ち↓に↑飢↑↓う↓えた↑残忍↑↓ざんにん↓さで↑悪名↑↓あくめい↓↑高↑↓たか↓い。
sdata.e: Sharks are infamous for their bloodthirsty natures.

sdata.j: ↑鮫↑↓さめ↓はその↑血↑↓ち↓に↑飢↑↓う↓えた↑残忍↑↓ざんにん↓さで↑悪名↑↓あくめい↓↑高↑↓たか↓い。
sdata.e: Sharks are notorious for having a thirst for blood.

sdata.j: ↑鮫↑↓さめ↓は↑魚↑↓さかな↓を↑食↑↓た↓べます。
↑鮫↑↓さめ↓は↑魚↑↓さかな↓を↑餌↑↓えさ↓としている。

words.gloss: sturgeon (esp. the green sturgeon, Acipenser medirostris)
